channel.title: Shippings on Direct Charity
channel.description: Recent content in Shippings on Direct Charity

item.description: How to send a parcel from the USA to Ukraine through Meest 1. Collect items Warm children’s clothing are the most requested items. Natural fibers, like wool and cotton, have better thermal qualities than synthetic fibers, like polyester or nylon. 2. Pack the box Use box size 16x16x16 inches aiming for under 66 pounds weight. Tape the outside bottom of the box generously covering the middle seam completely. Put a layer or two of cardboard on the inside bottom of the box.
